LanguageData.FilUnderscore.PersistentRimWorlds.Confir: Are you sure you want to convert this world to a persistent world? There is no going back, and may be incompatible with some mods. This action will also overwrite any saves with the same name as the world name, this can be checked through the World tab in the save by clicking a tile and clicking the Planet tab in the bottom-left corner of your screen. You have been warned.
LanguageData.FilUnderscore.PersistentRimWorlds.Conver: Conversion for world {0} is complete. The persistent world will now be saved as {0} and can be loaded through the Persistent Worlds menu.
LanguageData.FilUnderscore.PersistentRimWorlds.Delete: Delete this colony permanently. It will disappear from the world map without any trace.
LanguageData.FilUnderscore.PersistentRimWorlds.BaseRe: Resettle into this abandoned colony base, it may be left in ruins after being left unmaintained for some time, or inhabited by pirates. Beware.
